mapper.insert: insert into mkt_campaign (MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY,ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL,IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_TYPE, SRC_ID, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EXEC_INIT_TIME, LAN_ID_FOUR, LAN_ID_FIVE) values (#{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tiggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planBeginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mktCampaignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktActivityTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calcDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isaleDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{execType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execInvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{camLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isCheckRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceCancleFlag,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lifeStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extMktCampaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execInitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanIdFour,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lanIdFive,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update mkt_campaign set INIT_ID =#{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TIGGER_TYPE = #{tiggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME = #{mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME = #{planBeginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, PLAN_END_TIME = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE = #{mktCampaignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_TYPE = #{mktCampaignCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR = #{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET = #{mktActivityTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC = #{mktCampaignDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALC_DISPLAY = #{calcDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISALE_DISPLAY = #{isaleDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EXEC_TYPE = #{execType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXEC_INVL = #{execInvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXEC_NUM = #{execNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_CHANNEL = #{createChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIRECTORY_ID = #{directoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAN_ID = #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAM_LEVEL = #{camLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_CHECK_RULE = #{isCheckRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_ID = #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TYPE = #{srcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG = #{serviceCancleFlag,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LIFE_STAGE = #{lifeStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{extMktCampaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXEC_INIT_TIME = #{execInitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAN_ID_FOUR = #{lanIdFour,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAN_ID_FIVE = #{lanIdFive,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME, LAN_ID_FOUR, LAN_ID_FIVE from mkt_campaign where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME, LAN_ID_FOUR, LAN_ID_FIVE from mkt_campaign where INIT_ID = #{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (STATUS_CD = 2002 or STATUS_CD = 2008)

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME, LAN_ID_FOUR, LAN_ID_FIVE from mkt_campaign order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, STATUS_CD, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_STAFF from mkt_campaign where 1 = 1
AND MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{map.mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (STATUS_CD = 2002 or STATUS_CD = 2003)
AND STATUS_CD != 2002 and STATUS_CD != 2003 AND STATUS_CD != 2005
AND STATUS_CD = 2005
AND TIGGER_TYPE = #{map.tiggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE = #{map.mktCampaignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MANAGE_TYPE = #{map.mktCampaignCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR like CONCAT('%',#{map.activityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND CREATE_CHANNEL like CONCAT('%',#{map.channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND STATUS_CD != 2001 order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, cam.TIGGER_TYPE, cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, cam.PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, cam.PLAN_END_TIME from mkt_campaign cam left join mkt_cam_strategy_conf_rel csrel on csrel.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID left join mkt_strategy_conf_rule_rel srrel on srrel.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = csrel.STRATEGY_CONF_ID where srrel.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{ruleId}

select cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID mktCampaignId, cam.CALC_DISPLAY displayId, label.INJECTION_LABEL_ID injectionLabelId, label.LABEL_DISPLAY_TYPE labelDisplayType, label.MESSAGE_TYPE remark from mkt_campaign cam, display_column_label label where label.DISPLAY_ID = cam.CALC_DISPLAY

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME, from mkt_campaign where INIT_ID = #{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, INIT_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME from mkt_campaign where INIT_ID = #{initId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (STATUS_CD = 2001 OR STATUS_CD = 2003 or STATUS_CD = 2004 or STATUS_CD = 2005 or STATUS_CD = 2009 )

SELECT t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, t.INIT_ID, t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, t.CREATE_DATE, t.MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, ( CASE t.LAN_ID WHEN '570' THEN '衢州' WHEN '571' THEN '杭州' WHEN '572' THEN '湖州' WHEN '573' THEN '嘉兴' WHEN '574' THEN '宁波' WHEN '575' THEN '绍兴' WHEN '576' THEN '台州' WHEN '577' THEN '温州' WHEN '578' THEN '丽水' WHEN '579' THEN '金华' WHEN '580' THEN '舟山' WHEN '1' THEN '浙江省' END ) SRC_ID FROM mkt_campaign t LEFT JOIN trial_operation p1 ON p1.CAMPAIGN_ID = t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID WHERE t.STATUS_CD IN ('2002', '2008') AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE NOT IN ('5000', '6000') AND t.TIGGER_TYPE = #{tiggerType} AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%模板%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME != '' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%test%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%演示%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%勿动%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID NOT IN ( SELECT p1.CAMPAIGN_ID FROM mkt_campaign t LEFT JOIN trial_operation p1 ON p1.CAMPAIGN_ID = t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID WHERE t.STATUS_CD IN ('2002', '2008') AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE NOT IN ('5000', '6000') AND t.TIGGER_TYPE = #{tiggerType} AND p1.CREATE_DATE > #{createDate} AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%模板%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME != '' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%test%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%演示%' AND t.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME NOT LIKE '%勿动%' ) GROUP BY t.INIT_ID
